name.baseName: Other phenoxycarboxylic acid ; Raw materials ; Synthesis ; All sizes; NESPS2
其他苯氧羧酸类① ; 原料 ; 合成 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisActivated sludge process + shaped anaerobic reactor，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management76，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisActivated sludge process + shaped anaerobic reactor，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management76，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了各种苯氧羧酸衍生物的合成，这些衍生物可用于包括除草剂、药品和化学中间体制造等在内的一系列工业应用。数据还概述了几种用于处理制造过程中的污染物（如废水、化学需氧量、氨氮、有机结合氮、废气和挥发性有机化合物）的末端处理技术。这些处理技术包括活性污泥法、成型厌氧反应器、生物滤池、A/O工艺、凝结、吸收、吸附、蒸汽脱附和光催化。这些技术的实施是为了确保通过处理和减少污染物的排放，遵守环境法规。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,三级代码263.0文件，在完整版文件中第2936页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为其他苯氧羧酸类①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotocatalysis，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是光催化，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisCondensation + (absorption + diversion) + (adsorption + steam desorption)/(adsorption + nitrogen/air desorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是冷凝法+（吸收+分流）+吸附+蒸汽解析）/（吸附+氮气/空气解析），其效率为97，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisActivated sludge process + biological filter + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是活性污泥法+生物滤池+A/O工艺，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisShaped anaerobic reactor + biological filter + A/O process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是定型厌氧反应器类+生物滤池+A/O工艺，其效率为93，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/（治理设施运行时数（小时）*治理设施额定功率(千瓦)）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisActivated sludge process + shaped anaerobic reactor，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater terminal treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
